## slu wait-for tcp

Wait for TCP connection

```
slu wait-for tcp [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -a, --address string   Address (eg.: google.com:443)
  -h, --help             help for tcp
  -t, --timeout int      Timeout (default 300)
```
